Name: [Artifice] Hypnotic Pocket Watch
Desc:
For {CReplaceCardParam:ProgressLeft,1,2} combats, enemy Stun duration decreases by <color=#CF4029>40%</color>.
Once reconstructed, enemy Stun duration increases by <color=#2BAD00>20%</color>.
Desc2: From how your eyelids start to get heavy when you stare at it, these hypnotic pocket watches are basically the same as your summer homework.
